messages.messageBody:
>> What do you think about having each of us who's willing, summarize
therequirements made in our various states. It would help with the
guessing,and might help people who want to work on those things and try to
make lifeeasier for homeschooling -- with the ultimate goal of making
homeschoolersseem less like second class citizens. <<


<A HREF="http://www.nhen.org/LegInfo/default.asp?id=241">National Home Education Network - NHEN: Legislative Information Main Page</A>
http://www.nhen.org/LegInfo/default.asp?id=241

All hsing laws, etc., briefly summarized by homeschoolers in their own
states.

--pamS
